name: Janus Analysis
description:
Future plans for this project: UI, audio, and narrative polish + windows/mac/mobile builds

A game about confronting a mysterious person who calls themselves 'Janus'.  You find yourself in a strange room, and Janus prompts you to make different choices in front of the statue of twin doors. Who is this Janus, and what is the point behind the decisions you make?

Submission for the 72 hr Mini Jam #126 (theme: "Lost", limitation: "Time is a resource"). I made this visual novel in a 2D javascript game engine called Ct.js! There is still some story and UI polish I'd love to do in the future, so stay tuned!

Please note: The audio isn't working properly. I have to convert some files to a different format soon! The audio doesn't affect gameplay though.
